text:
Created attachment 23617
Simple XSL-FO file uesd to demonstrate this problem

The property of "keep-with-next" is employed to combine one fo:block and one fo:table and both of them should be displayed on the same page. However, in my example, it is not working. My fop version is Rev739376.

Thanks.
creator: mingyu.zhao@gmail.com
vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

The output is the expected result: the block and part of the table are displayed on the first page.
What you probably want is to set keep-together.within-page="always" on the table.

HTH,
Vincent

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
